response.overview: A Dickens classic brought thrillingly up to date in the teeming heartland of modern London, where a group of street smart young hustlers plan the heist of the century for the ultimate payday.
response.tagline: London's favorite thief is all grown up.
response.title: Twist

results.name: Twist Official Trailer (2021) - Michael Caine, Lena Headey, Rita Ora
